translation: Hello everyone!
transcript: 大家好！

translation: I am Ren Min from Enactus.
transcript: 我是任敏，来自创行。

translation: Enactus is a global non-profit organization.
transcript: 创行是一个全球性的非营利组织。

translation: And we provide services to college students from all over the world.
transcript: 我们服务于来自全球的大学生们。

translation: In China, we have led groups of post-85s, post-90s, and post-95s to discover themselves, find themselves and their real driving force for innovation through project-based learning for 16 years.
transcript: 在中国，我们通过了16年的时间，带领了一批批的85后、90后和95后，通过项目式学习带领大家发现自我，找到自我，找到我们真正的创新的原动力。

translation: I participated in an Enactus project for the first time in 2003.
transcript: 我是2003年第一次参加了创行的项目。
在2006年的时候。

translation: I was assigned to pioneer the Chinese market on behalf of Enactus.
transcript: 我被委任于担任创行在中国的这样子的一个拓荒牛的角色。

translation: Therefore, in the past 15 years.
transcript: 所以在这过去的15年当中。

translation: On this platform, I have known and made friends with generations of ambitious and wonderful young people.
transcript: 通过这个平台，我认识和结识了一代代有理想有抱负，精彩的年轻人们。

translation: The topic I'd like to share with you today is the leadership of the new generation in the digital age.
transcript: 我今天想跟大家分享的主题，就是在数字化时代下的新生代领导力。

translation: The industrial revolution and the invention of the steam engine brought us into an era of the great development of mechanization.
transcript: 工业革命，蒸汽机的发明把我们带入了一个机械化大发展的时代。

translation: The Internet revolution and the information explosion in this digital age have taken us into an all-inclusive era of reform and information.
transcript: 数字化时代，互联网革命，信息的大爆炸，又让我们身处在一个裹挟一切的，变革的，信息化的时代。

translation: What are the characteristics of the digital natives who grew up in this era?
transcript: 在这个时代下成长起来的数字化的原住民，他们具有什么样的特点呢？

translation: Their first characteristic is about the high speed.
transcript: 他们的第一个特点是快。

translation: They are a generation who looks for novelty and swiftness.
transcript: 他们是求新图快的一代。

translation: They grew up with the Internet and learn from it by osmosis.
transcript: 他们在互联网的背景下耳濡目染地生长起来。

translation: Stimulated by a variety of high-intensity and diversified Internet media.
transcript: 他们在各种各样的高强度、多元化的互联网的媒体的刺激下。

translation: They can penetrate more keenly and dig into various current affairs and political hot spots more quickly than any other age groups of our generation.
transcript: 是比我们任何的年龄段都更敏锐地可以洞察，更快速地挖掘到各种各样的时事热点和时政热点。

translation: In this process, they are not only the most sensitive generation that collects fastest information.
transcript: 他们在这个过程中不但是最敏感的一代，最快速挖掘信息的一代。

translation: But also the generation that can grasp, use and diffuse information in the fastest way.
transcript: 也是能够最快地掌握，最快地运用，最快地进行二次传播的一代。

translation: Here is an example.
transcript: 举个例子来说。

translation: To make a call for someone(to cheer for someone), an aid culture originated from live concerts in Japan.
transcript: “打Call”，这样子的一个源于日本的现场音乐会的这样子的一个应援文化。

translation: Under the understanding of our new generation, quickly made an internal transformation.
transcript: 在我们的新生代的了解下，迅速地，他们进行了一个内在的转化。

translation: They use it in various online shows that went viral in summer and in their daily buzz words.
transcript: 他们运用到了我们夏天的各种热播的网络综艺，他们用于了自己的日常的流行用语。

translation: Our new generation is leading our Internet slang culture in the fastest speed.
transcript: 我们的新生代们，在用他们快的速度，引领着我们的网络语言文化。

translation: Here is another example.
transcript: 再举个例子。

translation: How many of you were still playing Honor of Kings in July and August?
transcript: 大家有多少人在七八月份还在打着王者荣耀。

translation: Then in October and November.
transcript: 那么到了10月份11月份

translation: More people gathered together for PUBG.
transcript: 更多的人开始组织吃鸡。

translation: Then in January of 2018.
transcript: 那么到了18年的1月份。

translation: There were more people with their eyes glued to their phones while having dinner, and they would play quiz games like Knowledge Superman and Chongding Contest.
transcript: 我们看到更多的小伙伴们在吃饭的时候，在晚上的时候打开手机我们玩的是知识超人、冲顶大会。

translation: In the past two weeks.
transcript: 再到最近这两周来。

translation: Lots of people posted "husbands", namely their travel frog, in WeChat moments for no apparent reasons.
transcript: 莫名其妙地我看到了朋友圈里面大家都在晒“老公”，都在晒青蛙。

translation: Being a post-80s generation, sometimes I feel quite lost.
transcript: 我真的是有的时候作为一个80后，我有的时候会很恍惚。

translation: Why do I feel lost?
transcript: 我恍惚什么？

translation: I realize that in such an era, our young people are facing a variety of strong stimulus.
transcript: 我恍惚在这样子的一个时代下，我们的年轻人们在面临着多元化的强刺激的。

translation: Their concerns and interests are constantly changing.
transcript: 关注点和兴趣点在不断地转化。

translation: Things can be highly stimulating, buddha-like, fast-paced or arbitrary.
transcript: 可以是强刺激的，也可以是很佛性的，可以是快节奏的，也可以是随心所欲的。

translation: This fast change makes me suddenly realize that this is the new generation we are facing now.
transcript: 这种变化之快让我感到，这就是我们现在的新生代。

translation: It snowed heavily yesterday.
transcript: 昨天下大雪。

translation: I went to pick up my kid from school.
transcript: 哎我去接孩子放学。

translation: That was the first time I had seen how children of generation-z studied.
transcript: 那是我第一次看到我们现在的00后和10后的小朋友们他们是怎么学习的。

translation: They listened to music with earphones in their ears, took their mobile phones out occasionally to check on their frogs.
transcript: 他们耳朵里插着耳机在听着音乐，他们开着手机偶尔看看自己的青蛙。

translation: Looked at computer screens and talked about QQ zones.
transcript: 他们打开电脑在聊着QQ空间。

translation: While doing their math and Chinese homework.
transcript: 他们同时还在处理着自己的数学作业、语文作业。

translation: Their ability to continuously switch information sources.
transcript: 他们这种不断地切换信息源的能力。

translation: Their ability to adapt to changes and their ability to process multitasking information at the same time really make me, a post-80s generation, realize that this is the generation we're going to face in the future.
transcript: 和他们的可以快速地移动的能力，和处理同时多任务处理信息的能力，真的是让我这个80后感到，这就是我们未来要面对的一代。

translation: A generation that asks for quickness and novelty.
transcript: 快，求新图变的一代。

translation: The second feature I'd like to share with you is "black".
transcript: 第二个特点想跟大家分享的是“黑”。

translation: What does "black" mean?
transcript: “黑”是什么意思？

translation: It is not about their appearance.
transcript: 不是说他们长得黑。

translation: But the black technology.
transcript: 而是黑科技。

translation: As a new generation that grows with the Internet.
transcript: 在互联网成长下的新生代。

translation: They have an indigenous reverence for science and technology.
transcript: 他们对于科技有着原住民式的崇尚。

translation: On the one hand, they have higher requirements for Internet tools.
transcript: 一方面他们对于互联网工具有着更高的要求。

translation: It is difficult for them to accept tools that lag in response or have various bugs.
transcript: 他们很难接受反应迟钝、处处有BUG。

translation: On the other hand, they are fast learners.
transcript: 另外一方面他们又是个快速的学习者。

translation: They have a natural sense of challenge, a natural desire of learning, a natural motive and motivation to try any new Internet tool.
transcript: 他们对于任何一个新生的互联网工具有着天生的挑战感，有着天生的学习感，有着天生的想要去试一试的动机和动力。

translation: Enactus organizes a big competition every year.
transcript: 在创行我们每年会组织一个大赛。

translation: In this competition.
transcript: 在这个大赛上。

translation: we ask every college student team to show their projects in the most current, fun and interesting way.
transcript: 我们要求每一个大学生团队都要用最新，最好玩儿，最有趣的方式来展示他们的项目。

translation: From my observation, normally the lead creators of each display team are not specialized in the design, multimedia or visual presentation.
transcript: 我观察到每一次的这样的展示小组，他们的展示的这个主创人员基本上没有是专业的学设计的，学多媒体的，做视觉呈现的。

translation: But they are self-taught based on their own interests and challenges.
transcript: 他们全部都是基于自己的兴趣和挑战感去自学的。

translation: Such as Awen and Qian Jiawen shown on PPT.
transcript: 这包括了现在在PPT上看到的阿文和钱嘉文。

translation: Both of them are popular public figures in the PPT field and have more than 200,000 fans.
transcript: 这两位他们都是PPT界的网红大咖，每个人都有20万以上的粉丝。

translation: They both learn and master internet tools based on their interests in this.
transcript: 他们都是根据自己对于这的兴趣去学习的，去掌握的互联网工具。

translation: There is another example.
transcript: 再举个例子。

translation: Zhang Ziling, a post-95 colleague from our office who does marketing.
transcript: 我们办公室的负责市场的一位，啊95后的同事张子凌。

translation: The organizing committee of Zaojiu Talk told me that the presentation tool we are going to use today is Keynote and I should prepare the photos and text and send them the archive.
transcript: 当造就的组委会跟我说今天我们要演用的展示工具是keynote，请你把这个照片、文字呃整理好，打包给我就好了。

translation: That's what I briefed Ziling.
transcript: 我也是这么brief子凌的。

translation: After hearing this, Ziling responded directly.
transcript: 子凌听了之后直接甩给我一句话。

translation: I'd rather learn it myself and make it by myself instead of spending time communicating with others.
transcript: 与其花费这个时间要跟别人沟通，我自己去学一下，我自己就可以把它做出来。

translation: So it merely took him two weeks to present all the keynote content that I showed you today.
transcript: 所以他用了很短的时间两周的时间给大家呈现了今天我呈我演示的所有的keynote的内容。

translation: I went to check my computer.
transcript: 这个时候我去翻看一下我的电脑。

translation: It might look like this.
transcript: 长得可能是这个样子的。

translation: Then I went to look at the computers of post-90s and post-95s in our office.
transcript: 然后我再去翻看一下我们办公室90后、95后的电脑。

translation: This is how they look like.
transcript: 他们用的是这个。

translation: Why is there such a huge difference?
transcript: 为什么会出现这样的一个巨大的差异？

translation: Because they have the passion, mastery and super confidence for the black technology and Internet tools.
transcript: 一个黑科技，对于互联网工具的热爱、掌握和超强的自信心。

translation: In my days.
transcript: 就是因为在我那个年代。

translation: The way I came into contact with computers is to put on shoe covers and enter the computer room.
transcript: 我去接触计算机的时候我得套上鞋套，我得进入机房。

translation: We sat there.
transcript: 我坐在那儿。

translation: And then the teacher told me how to turn on the computer.
transcript: 然后老师告诉我怎么开机。

translation: How to turn it off.
transcript: 怎么关机。

translation: And how to open the Word and Excel.
transcript: 怎么打开Word，怎么开Excel。

translation: On the contrary, the new generation now are the genuine natives.
transcript: 但是现在的新生代呢，他们真正的是原住民。

translation: They have access to iPads.
transcript: 他们出生的时候就接触到的是iPad。

translation: Smart phones and various electronic tools the moment they are born.
transcript: 是智能手机，是各种各样的电子化的工具。

translation: They learn through active learning and exploration process that is based on their interests, hobbies and curiosity.
transcript: 他们是基于的内生的兴趣、爱好、好奇心主动学习的过程，探索的过程。

translation: Rather than the process of passive learning.
transcript: 而不是一个被动学习的过程。

translation: So one is passive, and the other is active.
transcript: 所以一个被动、一个主动。

translation: One is deficient, and the other is sufficient.
transcript: 一个匮乏、一个充分。

translation: People growing up in two different environments naturally shows different confidence in the application of Internet tools.
transcript: 在两个不同的生态系统成长起来的人，自然对于互联网工具的应用的自信心是截然不一样的。

translation: The last feature is that our new generation cares for themselves a lot.
transcript: 最后一个特点就是我们的新生代们，他们非常的关注自我。

translation: They speak from the bottom of their hearts for their personal opinions and self-expression.
transcript: 他们从心底里非常的崇尚的是个人的发声，个人的展示。

translation: Currently, there are various tools on our platform, including videos, live broadcasts, texts and so on.
transcript: 现在我们的平台上有各种各样的工具，有视频、直播，有文字的呃等等。

translation: All of which provide the new generation with more channels to make their voice heard, to show themselves, to be recognized and to receive feedback from the outside world.
transcript: 都是让我们的新生代了有了更多的可以发声的渠道，有了更多的可以自我展示被外界认可和反馈的这样子的一个通道。

translation: I have another example for you.
transcript: 再举一个例子。

translation: A month ago, in December, we attempted to launch a contest called "Campus Reds Contest".
transcript: 在一个月前，12月份的时候，我们尝试性地推出了一个叫“校园红人大赛”。

translation: We also wanted to know to what extent college students want to be famous.
transcript: 我们也想看看现在的大学生们到底有多想红。

translation: In fact, under the very limited publicity and distribution channels, and since the brand impression of Enactus before actually takes the commercial practice and public welfare practice as the prerequisite.
transcript: 其实在非常有限的宣发渠道下，而且创行其实之前的一个品牌印象是一个商业实践、公益实践这样子的一个前提。

translation: Many students enthusiastically signed up and showed support.
transcript: 非常多大学生的踊跃的报名和支持。

translation: In just one week.
transcript: 在短短的一周内。

translation: We had more than 2 million views.
transcript: 我们的浏览量就上了两百多万。

translation: In this process.
transcript: 在这个过程中。

translation: We saw that college students have different ways of making their voices heard.
transcript: 我们看到了大学生发声的方式都不一样。

translation: Some people said they wanted to show their photography skills.
transcript: 有的人是说我想展示我的摄影。

translation: Some said they wanted to show their knowledge of Chinese language and culture.
transcript: 有的人说我想展示我的汉语言文化。

translation: And some college students said that they wanted to show that they were a model.
transcript: 有的大学生说我想展示我是一个Model。

translation: Some said that they wanted to be an influencer, etc.
transcript: 我想当网红等等等等。

translation: All in all, everyone's needs are different.
transcript: 总而言之大家的需求不一样。

translation: But everyone needs a platform to be recognized, acknowledged and seen.
transcript: 但是大家都需要一个被认可、被承认、被关注的平台。

translation: Okay.
transcript: 好。

translation: So we are facing a new generation like this.
transcript: 那么我们面对的是这样子的新生代。

translation: What should organizations and Bosses do?
transcript: 我们的组织和我们的Boss应该怎么做呢？

translation: One of my immediate thoughts at this moment is, since I am a post-80s.
transcript: 这个时候我马上的一个想法是，既然我作为80后。

translation: If there is no obstacle for me to lead and communicate with the post-80s generation, then I shall ask the post-90s generation.
transcript: 我去呃带领和沟通80后没有任何的障碍的话，那让我去问问90后们吧。

translation: I will ask the post-90s entrepreneurs how they lead their teams.
transcript: 让我问问90后的创始人们，他们是如何带领他们的90后的小伙伴儿的。

translation: I interviewed about a dozen entrepreneurs that belong to the post-90s generation.
transcript: 我采访了，我采访了大概呃十几位这样子的，90后的创始人们。

translation: In fact, the answer they gave me was identical to the MU train theory of imagination.
transcript: 他们其实给我的答复就是动车组脑洞。

translation: What is that?
transcript: 怎么理解呢？

translation: The way the present post-90s lead the post-90s is not like the old green train.
transcript: 现在的90后带90后的方式已经不是过去的绿皮车，是一个火车头。

translation: Which has a locomotive with a superpower and super engine, and then drives all the way with the cars behind it.
transcript: 它拥拥有这个超强的动力，超强的发动机，然后带着后面的车厢一路往前赶。

translation: It's not like this.
transcript: 不是这样子。

translation: Now the way the present post-90s lead the post-90s is that we hope that every post-90s and every new generation can become a powerful train car driven by their own energy, fully powered.
transcript: 现在90后带90后的方式是我们希望每一个90后、每一个新生代都能够成为自带能源、动力满满的动力组车厢。

translation: And all of us will work hard to move forward together.
transcript: 大家一起努力往前走。

translation: Let's look at a few cases.
transcript: 我们来看几个案例。

translation: The first case is "Letsdraw".
transcript: 第一个案例叫“来画”。

translation: This young man studied Finance which has nothing to do with visual communication and computer.
transcript: 这个小伙子他是学金融的，然后跟视觉传达，跟电脑计算机没有半点关系。

translation: In the interview, I asked him.
transcript: 但是我在访问他。

translation: How do you understand leadership and how do you lead your post-90s buddies?
transcript: 我说你是怎么理解领导力的，你是怎么带领90后的小伙伴儿的？

translation: He told me that he attributes it to empathy.
transcript: 他告诉我说，我是用同理心。

translation: I found a market pain point with empathy.
transcript: 我用同理心找到了一个市场痛点。

translation: The pain point is that my new generation buddies told me.
transcript: 这个痛点就是来自于我的新生伴代的小伙伴儿们告诉我说。

translation: Why is it so difficult for me to make hand-drawn videos?
transcript: 我做手绘视频怎么这么困难？

translation: Why don't we have a tool like PPT to draw videos by hand?
transcript: 为什么没有一个工具能够像PPT，做PPT那样来做手绘视频？

translation: So I realized this is a market requirement.
transcript: 所以我发现了这是一个市场需求。

translation: And I need to meet this requirement.
transcript: 我需要来满足这个需求。

translation: Similarly, I also came close to every post-90s friend of mine with empathy.
transcript: 同样我也是带着同理心，来走进我的每一个90后的小伙伴们。

translation: He is now leading 150 employees.
transcript: 他现在有150个员工。

translation: I try to understand their thoughts, angers and sorrows.
transcript: 我去了解他们的所思所想，所怒所哀。

translation: For example, in what kind of environment and after what kind of events do you think the cohesion of your organization is the best.
transcript: 我说，比如说，在什么样的一个环境下，在什么样的一个事件之后你觉得你们的这个组织的凝聚力是最爆棚的。

translation: And everyone's performance is the best?
transcript: 每个人的绩效是最棒的？

translation: He said it was after the team building.
transcript: 他说是在团建之后。

translation: I asked, what do you do for team building?
transcript: 我说你是怎么做团团建的？

translation: He told me that they would pick a working day.
transcript: 他告诉我说，我们做团建就是周一到周五找一个工作日的时间。

translation: Rent a beautiful and luxurious villa or book a five-star hotel and stay there for two days.
transcript: 我们去租一个很漂亮的很奢侈的别墅或者是一个五星级的酒店，大家玩两天。

translation: I was really shocked by this.
transcript: 这个观点让我很震惊。

translation: As a post-80s, what I think of team building is to arrange some training.
transcript: 作为一个80后的人，在我脑海中的天经地义的团建一定是要安排什么素拓，要安排什么培训。

translation: And it is best not to interfere with working hours.
transcript: 而且最好是不耽误工作时间。

translation: However, his case of team building pushed me to ask more other post-90s entrepreneurs.
transcript: 但是他给我的这个团建的案例，又让我去问了更多的一些其他的90后的创始人们。

translation: Their answers were basically the same.
transcript: 他们基本上的答复都是一样的。

translation: This is the difference caused by the lack of empathy between the two generations.
transcript: 这就是两个世代之间没有同理心造成的差别。

translation: What we do for team building may not really be favored by our new generation friends.
transcript: 我们做出来的团建可能真的不是符合我们的新生代的小伙伴儿们所喜爱的。

translation: The second example is WhatYouNeed.
transcript: 第二个例子是WhatYouNeed。

translation: There are five founders.
transcript: 他们的创始人是五个。

translation: They are all 24-year-old college graduates.
transcript: 呃24岁的呃大学毕业的这样的大学生。

translation: What they did is that hey created a new media account called WhatYouNeed.
transcript: 那么他们呢是创建了一个新媒体大号叫WhatYouNeed。

translation: Basically, each of their articles has more than 100,000 views.
transcript: 他们的基本上每一篇文章可以上十万加。

translation: And the activities they organize have been widely responded to and recognized by youngsters.
transcript: 他们组织的活动都得到了年轻人的广泛的响应和认可。

translation: When I interviewed their editor-in-chief, he told me that they think the most important thing is to create a culture in the office that allows everyone to speak freely and emphasizes efficient cooperation.
transcript: 当我问到呃他们的主编的时候，他告诉我说，我们认为最重要的，是在办公室内，是在文化创建上，创建一个让大家可以畅所欲言的，强调高效协作的这样的一个文化。

translation: We even make changes for trivial things such as the arrangement of furniture.
transcript: 我们小到说。

translation: We felt that long tables hinder equal speech and would lead to a sense of authority and inequality.
transcript: 我们觉得可能那个长条桌会阻碍大家的平等的发言，会导致权威的这种有权威感、不平等感。

translation: So we replaced it with round tables and square tables.
transcript: 我们把它换成了圆桌和方桌。

translation: We also encourage our staff to share their thoughts and creative ideas anytime and anywhere.
transcript: 再到我们鼓励我们的呃小伙伴们随时随地都可以发表你自己的任何的创意和创想。

translation: And any one of them could be the leader of the next project.
transcript: 你可能就是下一个项目的领导者。

translation: This is the inspiration from WhatYouNeed.
transcript: 这个是来自于WhatYouNeed给我的一个感受。

translation: The last example is from Hu Jiawei.
transcript: 那最后一个案例是来自于，胡佳威。

translation: He has turned the topic of sex education for children.
transcript: 他把一个让我们觉得儿童性教育这样的一个话题。

translation: Which we think can only be made into public welfare projects.
transcript: 让我们觉得只能做成公益项目的这样的一个话题。

translation: Into a social enterprise that takes into account both business and social influence.
transcript: 做成了一个兼顾商业又兼顾社会影响力的社会企业。

translation: I was shocked to know that.
transcript: 我震惊于说。

translation: In the post-90s world, a topic like this can be made into a business.
transcript: 哦原来在90后的世界里，也可以把这样子的一个主题做成一门生意。

translation: I asked, how did you make it?
transcript: 我说，你是怎么做到的？

translation: He said, I did not study education.
transcript: 他说我不是学教育的。

translation: And I haven't had much experience or even had no practical experience in education before I embarked on this career.
transcript: 我在做这项事业之前也没有经历或者也没有积累过很多的关于这个教育这方面的这个实际的经验。

translation: However, I recognized the wide social influence and value of the topic of children's sex education in China.
transcript: 但是，我认识到了儿童性教育这个话题，对于中国广泛的社会影响力和价值。

translation: I recognized my fast learning ability.
transcript: 我认识到了我身上具备的快速的学习能力。

translation: And I can skillfully take advantage of the capacity of Internet communication.
transcript: 我能够熟练地应用互联网传播的能力。

translation: I think I can give it a try.
transcript: 我想，我可以试试看。

translation: Therefore, he carries his own dream and his own sense of value.
transcript: 所以，他带着他自己的梦想，带着他自己的价值感。

translation: Each of his articles has more than 100,000 views.
transcript: 他现在做到了文章可以上十万加。

translation: And he also does a live broadcast of children's sex education at the same time, which has more than 200,000 views.
transcript: 他还可以同时做一个儿童性教育的直播可以上二十万加。

translation: Two hundred thousand parents are willing to go on the live broadcast platform at the same time to listen to Hu Jiawei's team talking about children's sex education.
transcript: 有二十万的家长愿意同时在直播平台上去听，胡佳威他领导的团队怎么讲儿童性教育这个话题。

translation: And he developed a series of products.
transcript: 而且他开发了一系列的产品。

translation: Including cartoon books, videos, derivatives, toys that are all about this topic.
transcript: 包括绘本、视频、衍生品、玩具，都是围绕着这个话题。

translation: He told me that.
transcript: 他告诉我说。

translation: It was this sense of mission and value that drove him to move forward and to make it an enterprise with both commercial and social values.
transcript: 就是这样子使命感，价值感驱使着我，让我往前进，让我把它做成了一个兼具商业和社会价值的社会企业。

translation: What the young leaders told me may sound familiar, ordinary and simple, however, their words stress out the necessity of a mechanism that consist of trust, respect, listening and open communication.
transcript: 这么多精彩的年轻人，告诉我的或许就是这一些看起来熟悉、平凡、朴素的话语，是信任、尊重、倾听、开放的通沟通机制，

translation: They attach importance on timely and open recognition, stimulation of innovation, in-time guidance and tracking as well as feedback.
transcript: 是及时公开的认可以及激发创新，及时的辅导跟踪和反馈。

translation: It sounds like we post-80s generation does the same thing, right?
transcript: 听起来好像和我们80后做的事情也是差不多的，对吗？

translation: Then why do we often have all kinds of conflicts, explicit or implicit, in our work from time to time ?
transcript: 那么为什么我们在工作当中，还时不时地会经常明里暗里地发生各种各样的冲突呢？

translation: After studying the way the post-90s lead the post-90s.
transcript: 在学习了90后在领90后之后。

translation: What we need to reflect on is.
transcript: 我们要反思的是说。

translation: Why can't we do it well?
transcript: 为什么我们带不好？

translation: Or why do we encounter so many barriers when we do it?
transcript: 或者是我们带的时候总是有那么多的隔阂呢？

translation: Let's think about what advantages our generation has.
transcript: 让我们想想我们这个世代拥有的优势到底是什么。

translation: I think social resources, professional ability and industry insights are obviously our advantages.
transcript: 我认为社会资源、专业能力、行业洞察显然都是我们的优势。

translation: However, on the basis of this advantage.
transcript: 可是在这个优势的基础上。

translation: We often fall into a puzzling or subconscious intergenerational superiority.
transcript: 我们经常就陷入了一个莫名其妙或者是潜意识的这个代际的优越感。

translation: Because we think we have something that you don't have.
transcript: 因为我们觉得我们有这个、这个、这个。

translation: So I must be better than you.
transcript: 所以我一定比你强。

translation: Although sometimes we don't show it evidently.
transcript: 虽然有的时候我们并没有表面上表现出来。

translation: But when we have a meeting, when we communicate with the new generation.
transcript: 但是我们想想我们开会的时候，我们和新生代沟通的时候。

translation: We have more or less an attitude that make young people think that we are looking down on them.
transcript: 是不是或多或少的都带了一种俯视的态度，带了一种我比你强。

translation: We talk and communicate with them with a sense of superiority.
transcript: 我比你优越的态度在跟他们对话和沟通。

translation: At that time, what we can get is either resistance or compromise, or the kind of acceptance that is reluctant.
transcript: 那这个时候我们能够得到的自然不是抗拒就是妥协。

translation: And they won't talk about it.
transcript: 要不然就是嘴上不说，但是心里很不爽的那种默默地勉强地接纳。

translation: Of course.
transcript: 当然。

translation: We have also witnessed more post-70s and post-80s leaders becoming more open-minded, more curious and more willing to come into contact with our new generation.
transcript: 我们也看到了越来越多的70后80后的领导人们其实变得更开放，更愿意有好奇心，更愿意去接触我们的新生代。

translation: At this moment, we may consider trying the travel frog.
transcript: 这个时候我们可能会说，让我也来养个蛙吧。

translation: Learning Internet buzz words used by youngsters, and making friends with them!
transcript: 让我也来学习一下这年轻人的都用的什么样的一些网络流行词汇，让我来跟你们做朋友吧！

translation: But what was the reply we got?
transcript: 可是我们得到的答复什么？

translation: Let's think about our new generation's reply to us.
transcript: 大家想一想我们的新生代给我们的答复是什么？

translation: Basically, they will give you no attention and ignore you.
transcript: 基本上就是不甩、不理。

translation: Or they will reluctantly stay with you for just a while.
transcript: 或者是勉强地陪你玩一会儿。

translation: Next time when you ask him for dinner, He wouldn't even come.
transcript: 下一次你叫他吃饭的时候,他都不愿意来。

translation: Why?
transcript: 为什么？

translation: It is because we don't cater to them.
transcript: 就是因为我们不能去迎合他们。

translation: This kind of deliberate catering and pleasing cannot meet their inner needs.
transcript: 这种刻意的迎合、取悦的迎合是不能直击他们的内心需求的。

translation: This is only superficial efforts.
transcript: 这个只是表面的一种迎合。

translation: It will make them feel it's like a toxic relationship.
transcript: 会让他们觉得就像谈恋爱当中的关系一样。

translation: I desperately go after someone and please someone.
transcript: 我拼命地去追求一个人，我去取悦一个人。

translation: But usually, what I get is rejection, strangeness, and "leave me alone".
transcript: 但是通常来说，这个人给到我的反馈基本上就是拒绝、违和感、你不要再理我了。

translation: So what I want to say is that each generation holds its own attitude, views and advantages.
transcript: 所以我想要说的是，每个世代都有每个世代自己的态度、观点和我们的优势。

translation: In fact, what we need to do is, on the one hand, stick to ourselves and believe in ourselves.
transcript: 我们其实需要做的就是一方面坚持自我，相信自己。

translation: On the other hand, we will create an ecology of integration.
transcript: 另外一方面我们来创造融合的生态。

translation: And we will create an ecology based on the integration of our two generations.
transcript: 我们来创造一种基于我们两个世代的融合的生态。

translation: We hope that the next two generations can become two magnets that have their own advantages, attitudes and opinions, and can attract and integrate with each other.
transcript: 我们希望我们未来的两代人可以成为两块磁铁，这两块磁铁身上各具优势，各具态度和观点，能够相互吸引，彼此融合。

translation: This is what we hope to achieve.
transcript: 这才是我们希望达成的状态。

translation: We hope that we live the present together with our new generation.
transcript: 我们希望可以和我们的新生代一起，一起共感当下。

translation: Make changes and create a better future together!
transcript: 共感变化，共创未来！

translation: Thank you all!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
